Package com.rift.coad.lib.deployment

Class Summary
BeanInfo The object that stores the information about a Coadunation bean.
CoadunationParser The parser is responsible for parsing the Coadunation xml file so that it can be deployed within the coadunation server.
DeploymentInfo The
DeploymentLoader  
DeploymentLoader.ClassLoaderLookup This class is responsible for supplying a lookup mechanism for stub code files based on the class loader that loaded them.
DeploymentManager This object is responsible for controlling the loading of Coadunation deployment files using the deployment loader and other management objects.
DeploymentMonitor This object is responsible for supplying information about the deployment process.
DeploymentThreadInfo This class contains the thread information for either for a bean or jmx bean deployment.
JMXBeanInfo The JMX object responsible for storing the bean information.
WebServiceInfo This class contains web service information
 

Exception Summary
DeploymentException This exception will get thrown when there is an error while loading in a jar.
